comments: This file is used to configure the Farcaster miniapp for the DevCreds project.
Replace the accountAssociation section with your own values for production.
Replace homeUrl, iconUrl, imageUrl, splashImageUrl with your own values for production.
Add your base app wallet addresses to the allowedAddresses section to access analytics on base app

miniapp.name: DevCreds
miniapp.subtitle: Developer Reputation On-Chain
miniapp.description: DevCreds is a verifiable developer skill ledger on Arbitrum. Get peer attestations, showcase your expertise, and build trust in the Web3 ecosystem.
